page.title: 10Cople
page.content:
Cople is just off the A603, Bedford to Sandy Road. It has a population of 800, many of whom have families with young children who go to the popular local school.
Like many Bedfordshire villages it is built along one main street. But there are a number of houses in Water End which is off the main road. There is a village store and post office which sells local people their daily food and household needs.
Most of the working people have to leave the village for Bedford. Sandy, Biggleswade or further afield to find work. Only a few are employed in the school, garage or local farms.
